inscription:
Inscription and mark

Inscribed, on verso: [Voghera]; in contemporary hand:  [Pinelli]
markings:
Stamp, recto LL corner in violet ink; [GC]; Lugt 540; 
l.r. in blue ink;
medium: Pen, ink and bistre wash over black chalk
provenance: Giuseppe Chiantorre, Lugt 540, recto l.l. corner in violet ink and l.r. in blue ink
title: Charity
